SELECT permissionuser.id , permissionuser.deleted , permissionuser.created_at as createdAt , permissionuser.modified_at as modifiedAt
, permissionuser.permission_id as permissionId , permissionuser.user_id as userId FROM permissionuser WHERE permissionuser.id = #{id}

SELECT permissionuser.id FROM permissionuser
ORDER BY permissionuser.id permissionuser.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
SELECT count(permissionuser.id) as listsize FROM permissionuser

SELECT permissionuser.id FROM permissionuser
AND #{cursor} > permissionuser.id ORDER BY permissionuser.id DESC
AND permissionuser.id > #{cursor} ORDER BY permissionuser.id ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
